metadata.description: General Orders from Commanding General Douglas MacArthur awarding the Silver Star to four officers of the Philippine Army (Major General Basilio Valdes, Colonel Manuel Nieto, Lieutenant Colonel Andres Soriano, and Major Basilio Fernando) for their gallantry in action
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Military; official papers
metadata.title: General Orders from Commanding General Douglas MacArthur awarding the Silver Star to four officers of the Philippine Army
